name: anthem
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a song that has special importance for a particular group of people, an organization, or a country, often sung on a special occasion: The national anthems of the teams are played at the beginning of international football matches. John Lennon's "Imagine" has become the anthem of peace-lovers all over the world.
a religious song sung by a choir with organ music See also
national anthem
